home.title: I'm Greg Martirosian
home.firstDescr: Hi, thank you for visiting my portfolio! As a frontend developer with a passion for Angular, I focus on crafting intuitive and engaging user experiences.
home.secondDescr: Here, you can discover my latest projects, dive into my skill set, and see the innovative solutions I've developed. I'm excited to share my work with you!

about.aboutMe: Passionate and motivated web developer, working on projects for various clients, combining the art of design with the art of programming Curious about new digital technologies and interested in everything tech-related.

gcore.experienceDescr: Worked on the company's website. With the help of the angular, created the user interface/UX and the logical part of the site. I worked on a calculator where complex logic and requests to the server for data for the calculator were implemented. I used node.js and the nest framework for the backend.

freelance.experienceDescr: Implementing websites and mobile applications with a responsive, mobile-first approach from concept through deployment, while constantly maintaining, optimizing, troubleshooting, and improving websites for various clients.

utest.experienceDescr: Finding and reporting bugs and glitches, through manual testing. Ensuring that products, applications and systems work correctly and that user expectations are met during the testing process.

freeCode.educationPosition: Responsive Web Design, JavaScript Algorithms & Data Structures, 2019

college.educationPosition: College of Business, Law and Social Sciences, 2006

gcore.overview: The Cloud Pricing Calculator is a web application that simplifies the process of estimating cloud service costs. It uses Angular, Scully, Strapi, Node.js/NestJS, PostgreSQL, TypeORM, TypeScript, and SCSS for a robust and user-friendly experience.

technologyStack.label: Angular
technologyStack.description: For building a dynamic, responsive front-end.

technologyStack.label: Scully
technologyStack.description: To generate static pages for better SEO and performance.

technologyStack.label: Strapi
technologyStack.description: Manages non-pricing content like labels and localization.

technologyStack.label: Node.js/NestJS
technologyStack.description: Powers the back-end for secure, scalable services.

technologyStack.label: PostgreSQL
technologyStack.description: Reliable database for storing pricing data.

technologyStack.label: TypeORM
technologyStack.description: Handles database operations.

technologyStack.label: TypeScript
technologyStack.description: Ensures type safety and maintainable code.

technologyStack.label: SCSS
technologyStack.description: Provides modular and maintainable styling.

gcore.problemSolved: The calculator addresses the complexity of estimating cloud costs, offering a clear and interactive tool to help users make informed decisions about their cloud service expenses.

features.label: Interactive Calculator
features.description: Users input parameters to get real-time cost estimates.

features.label: Dynamic Data Fetching
features.description: Prices are stored in PostgreSQL, updated from JSON files via NestJS.

features.label: Content Management
features.description: Strapi manages labels and localization content.

features.label: SEO Optimization
features.description: Scully generates static pages for improved search visibility.

features.label: Responsive Design
features.description: Angular and SCSS ensure a seamless experience on all devices.

implementationDetails.label: Frontend
list: Angular for a rich UI.
Scully for static page generation.
SCSS for clean styling.

implementationDetails.label: Backend
list: NestJS for a modular, scalable back-end.
JSON files parsed and stored in PostgreSQL using TypeORM.
Strapi for non-pricing content management.

implementationDetails.label: Database
list: PostgreSQL with TypeORM for robust data handling.

rslang.overview: The English Learning Application is a user-friendly web platform designed to facilitate language acquisition through engaging activities and resources. Built with React, Redux Toolkit, and TypeScript, it offers an immersive learning experience without the need for a backend server.

technologyStack.label: React
technologyStack.description: Powering a dynamic and interactive front-end interface.

technologyStack.label: Redux Toolkit
technologyStack.description: Managing application state efficiently for seamless user interactions.

technologyStack.label: TypeScript
technologyStack.description: Ensuring type safety and robust code maintenance.

technologyStack.label: MongoDB
technologyStack.description: Storing user progress data securely.

technologyStack.label: SCSS
technologyStack.description: Provides modular and maintainable styling.

rslang.problemSolved: The English Learning Application simplifies the language learning process by providing a variety of interactive activities and resources. Users can engage with vocabulary, grammar, and language skills exercises without relying on a backend server.

features.label: Learning Games
features.description: Interactive games to reinforce vocabulary, grammar, and language skills.

features.label: Learning Cards
features.description: Flashcards with audio pronunciations and contextual examples for effective learning.

features.label: Progress Tracking
features.description: MongoDB database to store and track user progress.

implementationDetails.label: Frontend
list: React and Redux Toolkit for a responsive and intuitive user interface.
Audio and Examples: Utilizing audio files and contextual examples to enhance learning.
SCSS for clean styling.

implementationDetails.label: Database
list: MongoDB for securely storing user progress data.

tic-tac-toe.overview: The Tic-Tac-Toe Game is a classic web-based game designed to provide entertainment and challenge players' strategic thinking. Developed using JavaScript, HTML, and SCSS.

technologyStack.label: JavaScript
technologyStack.description: Powering the game logic and interactivity.

technologyStack.label: HTML
technologyStack.description: Structuring the game's user interface.

technologyStack.label: SCSS
technologyStack.description: Styling the game components for enhanced visual appeal.

tic-tac-toe.problemSolved: The Tic-Tac-Toe Game provides users with a fun and interactive way to pass the time and sharpen their strategic skills. By offering a familiar and timeless game experience, it appeals to players of all ages.

features.label: Interactive Gameplay
features.description: Players can make moves and compete against each other in real-time.

features.label: Simple User Interface
features.description: A clean and intuitive interface makes the game easy to play for everyone.

features.label: Responsive Design
features.description: The game adapts to different screen sizes, allowing users to play on various devices.

implementationDetails.label: Frontend
list: JavaScript for game logic and user interactions.
HTML for structuring the game layout.
SCSS for styling the game components.

shelter.overview: The About the Shelter page offers insight into our shelter's mission and current status regarding animal welfare.

technologyStack.label: JavaScript
technologyStack.description: Handling interactive elements and dynamic content.

technologyStack.label: HTML
technologyStack.description: Structuring the page's content and layout.

technologyStack.label: SCSS
technologyStack.description: Styling the page components for visual appeal and consistency.

shelter.problemSolved: The About the Shelter page serves to inform visitors about our shelter's dedication to animal care and the challenges we face in finding homes for our furry residents. It offers a glimpse into our operations and the heartwarming stories behind our shelter pets.

features.label: Informative Content
features.description: Concise descriptions of our shelter's mission, current animal population, and adoption statistics.

features.label: Custom Slider
features.description: A unique slider feature showcasing our shelter pets and the efforts of our dedicated team.

features.label: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensuring accessibility across various devices for seamless viewing.

implementationDetails.label: Frontend
list: JavaScript for interactive elements and dynamic content.
HTML for structuring the page's layout and content.
CSS for styling the page components and ensuring visual consistency.

photo.overview: The Photographer Portfolio is a showcase of the photographer's talent, providing a platform for displaying captivating visuals captured through the lens. Developed using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, it delivers a concise yet engaging presentation without the need for frameworks or backend infrastructure.

technologyStack.label: JavaScript
technologyStack.description: Handling interactive elements and dynamic content.

technologyStack.label: HTML
technologyStack.description: Structuring the page's content and layout.

technologyStack.label: SCSS
technologyStack.description: Styling the page components for visual appeal and consistency.

photo.problemSolved: The Photographer Portfolio aims to highlight the photographer's unique style and creativity while providing visitors with an immersive viewing experience. It offers insight into the photographer's work and serves as a professional showcase for potential clients and admirers.

features.label: Informative Content
features.description: The Photographer Portfolio aims to highlight the photographer's unique style and creativity while providing visitors with an immersive viewing experience. It offers insight into the photographer's work and serves as a professional showcase for potential clients and admirers.

features.label: Language Support
features.description: Multilingual support for a broader audience reach and accessibility.

features.label: Custom Video Player
features.description: Integration of a custom video player for showcasing video content, such as behind-the-scenes footage or client testimonials.

features.label: Dark/Light Mode
features.description: Customizable interface design for optimal viewing comfort and aesthetics.

features.label: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensuring accessibility across various devices for seamless viewing.

implementationDetails.label: Frontend
list: JavaScript for interactive elements, language support, and custom video player integration.
HTML for structuring the portfolio's layout and content.
CSS for styling the portfolio components and implementing dark/light mode functionality.

travel.overview: The Travel Agency Website serves as a platform for travelers to explore destinations, plan trips, and book accommodations. Developed using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, it offers a comprehensive yet user-friendly interface without relying on frameworks or backend infrastructure.

technologyStack.label: JavaScript
technologyStack.description: Handling interactive elements and dynamic content.

technologyStack.label: HTML
technologyStack.description: Structuring the page's content and layout.

technologyStack.label: SCSS
technologyStack.description: Styling the page components for visual appeal and consistency.

travel.problemSolved: The Travel Agency Website addresses the need for travelers to easily access information about destinations, tour packages, and travel options. It provides a centralized hub for trip planning and booking, streamlining the travel experience for users.

features.label: Informative Content
features.description: Detailed descriptions and images of popular travel destinations.

features.label: Dark/Light Mode
features.description: Customizable interface design for optimal viewing comfort and aesthetics.

features.label: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensuring accessibility across various devices for seamless viewing.

implementationDetails.label: Frontend

HTML for structuring the website's layout and content.
CSS for styling the website components and ensuring visual consistency.

technologyStack.label: JavaScript
technologyStack.description: Powering interactive elements and dynamic content.

technologyStack.label: HTML
technologyStack.description: Structuring the website's layout and content.

furniture.problemSolved: The Travel Agency Website addresses the need for travelers to easily access information about destinations, tour packages, and travel options. It provides a centralized hub for trip planning and booking, streamlining the travel experience for users.

features.label: Furniture Showcase
features.description: A curated collection of furniture pieces with detailed descriptions and high-resolution images.

features.label: Blog Page
features.description: A dedicated section for articles, tips, and insights related to interior design, furniture trends, and home decor.

features.label: Responsive Design

image.overview: The API Image Gallery is a platform for exploring and discovering high-quality images sourced from an external API, inspired by the popular Unsplash website. Developed using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, it offers users a streamlined and visually appealing interface without the need for custom features like dark/light mode or a custom video player.

technologyStack.label: JavaScript
technologyStack.description: Powering interactive elements and dynamic content retrieval from the external API.

technologyStack.label: HTML
technologyStack.description: Structuring the gallery's layout and content.

technologyStack.label: SCSS
technologyStack.description: Styling the gallery components for visual appeal and consistency.

image.problemSolved: The API Image Gallery addresses the need for users to access a curated collection of high-quality images from an external API. It simplifies the process of browsing and discovering images, offering a user-friendly experience reminiscent of popular image-sharing platforms.

features.label: Image Collection
features.description: A curated selection of high-quality images sourced from an external API.

features.label: Streamlined Interface
features.description: A clean and intuitive interface for seamless browsing and discovery.

features.label: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensuring optimal viewing experience across various devices for accessibility.

implementationDetails.label: Frontend
list: JavaScript for interactive elements and dynamic content retrieval.
HTML for structuring the gallery's layout and content.
CSS for styling the gallery components and ensuring visual consistency.

keyboard.overview: The Virtual Keyboard Page is an interactive web application that provides users with an on-screen keyboard for text input. Developed using JavaScript (with classes for an OOP approach).

technologyStack.label: JavaScript
technologyStack.description: Implementing the keyboard functionality using classes for an object-oriented programming approach.

technologyStack.label: HTML
technologyStack.description: Structuring the layout and content of the virtual keyboard.

technologyStack.label: SCSS
technologyStack.description: Styling the keyboard components for enhanced visual appeal and consistency.

keyboard.problemSolved: The Virtual Keyboard Page addresses the need for an accessible and functional on-screen keyboard. It is particularly useful for devices without physical keyboards, or for users who require an alternative input method.

features.label: Interactive Keyboard
features.description: A fully functional on-screen keyboard for text input.

features.label: OOP Design
features.description: JavaScript classes used to implement a modular and maintainable codebase.

features.label: Customizable Layout
features.description: The keyboard layout can be easily customized to suit different needs.

features.label: Responsive Design
features.description: Ensuring optimal functionality and appearance across various devices.

implementationDetails.label: Frontend
list: JavaScript: Using classes to create the keyboard functionality and handle user interactions.
HTML: Structuring the layout of the keyboard and the text input area.
SCSS: Styling the keyboard components to ensure a consistent and visually appealing design.

bundler.overview: The HTML/CSS Bundler is a Node.js application designed to consolidate HTML and CSS files into a single index.html and style.css, while also cloning all asset files into the project's dist folder. Developed to enhance Node.js skills, this bundler streamlines the process of combining and organizing web project files.

technologyStack.label: Node js
technologyStack.description: Implementing the bundler functionality using Node.js.

bundler.problemSolved: The HTML/CSS Bundler addresses the need for a simplified way to merge multiple HTML and CSS files into single files, making it easier to manage and deploy web projects. It also ensures all assets are organized in the dist folder for seamless project distribution.

features.label: File Consolidation
features.description: Merges all HTML files into index.html and all CSS files into style.css.

features.label: Asset Cloning
features.description: Copies all asset files (images, fonts, etc.) into the dist folder.

features.label: Node.js Skills Enhancement
features.description: Provides hands-on experience with Node.js and file system operations.

features.label: Streamlined Workflow
features.description: Simplifies the process of preparing web projects for deployment.

implementationDetails.label: Backend
list: Node.js: Powers the bundler functionality, handling file reading, writing, and copying.
